tool.name: Verify Mapping Quality
tool.description: Checks the mapping quality of all BAM files generated in the core SNP pipeline.

param.name: mindepth
param.label: The minimum depth of coverage required in each BAM file.

param.name: minmap
param.label: The minimum percent coverage required in each BAM file.

tool.help:
What it does ============
This script checks the mapping quality of all BAM files generated in the core SNP pipeline.
Usage =====
**Parameters** - input - The collection of BAM files in the dataset.
**Options** - min-depth - The minimum depth of coverage required in each BAM file. - min-map - The minimum perecent coverage required in each BAM file.
